title: He Paid For A Stranger’s Ride (UAE) | Wait for the end
description: A 30-second emotional mini-story (cinematic). Comment: would you do this? #shorts

default.note: You can override per scene with { seconds: 2 } etc.

scenes.prompt: Night Dubai, inside modern UAE taxi, beige interior, rain on windows, neon reflections. Man late 20s, short black hair, trimmed beard, dark blue shirt, back seat holding phone + bank card, anxious. Taxi meter visible (no readable text). Shallow DOF, cinematic, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
My card got declined.
بطاقتي رفضت.

scenes.prompt: Extreme close-up hands shaking holding bank card over phone payment screen (no readable text), rain reflections, macro detail, shallow DOF, cinematic, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
I felt ashamed.
حسّيت بالخجل.

scenes.prompt: Taxi front seat POV, driver in rear-view mirror, calm eyes, warm dashboard light, rainy city lights bokeh outside, cinematic close-up, shallow DOF, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
He didn’t shout.
ما صرخ.

scenes.prompt: Taxi stopped at curb at night, rear door open. A well-dressed man stands outside holding phone, gentle concerned face. Rainy neon street, wet road reflections. Cinematic wide shot, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
Then… someone stepped in.
وبعدين… تدخل شخص.

scenes.prompt: Close-up, stranger hand offers phone/card to driver, driver nods. Warm interior light, rain streaks on window, shallow DOF, cinematic, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
No speeches.
بدون كلام.

scenes.prompt: Back seat close-up, passenger raises hand politely to stop it, watery eyes, embarrassed, shaky breathing. Shallow DOF, cinematic, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
Please… don’t.
لا… بالله.

scenes.prompt: Medium close-up, stranger smiles kindly and gestures 'it’s okay'. Warm light, rain bokeh, shallow DOF, cinematic, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
It’s okay.
عادي.

scenes.prompt: Close-up, passenger looks down, single tear, breathing steadies. Shallow DOF, cinematic, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
I’ll remember this forever.
ما راح أنسى.

scenes.prompt: Outside taxi under warm streetlight, rain lighter. Passenger steps out says thank you, stranger nods and walks away. Wet road reflections. Cinematic wide shot, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
You saved my day.
أنقذت يومي.

scenes.prompt: Wide shot, taxi drives away through rainy Dubai street, neon reflections, calm emotional ending. Cinematic, photorealistic.
scenes.caption:
Would you do this?
كنت بتسويها؟
